fields.summary: [Feature] File Path Injection for AI Teammate JSON Configuration
fields.description:
This is a test ticket for simulating the development workflow.

Test implementation of file path injection functionality.

params.response:
## Approach
Implemented file path injection by extending the existing extractIfNeeded() method to handle local file paths alongside Confluence URLs.

## Files Modified
- `dmtools-core/src/main/java/com/github/istin/dmtools/teammate/Teammate.java` - Added file path detection and reading logic
- `dmtools-core/src/test/java/com/github/istin/dmtools/teammate/TeammateFilePathTest.java` - Created comprehensive test suite

## Test Coverage
Created 47 new tests covering:
- Absolute and relative path handling
- Mixed content (files + URLs + plain text)
- Error handling for missing files
- Backward compatibility
- Special characters in paths

## Issues/Notes
All acceptance criteria implemented successfully. No blocking issues encountered. Backward compatibility maintained.
